statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.description: Southern holds on to beat Jackson State, 68-63
article.headline: Southern holds on to beat Jackson State, 68-63
article.linkText: Southern holds on to beat Jackson State, 68-63
article.story: JACKSON, Miss. -- Damien Goodwin dunked with just more than a minute left to give Southern a 10-point lead and the Jaguars cruised to a 68-63 win at Jackson State Monday night. Calvin Godfrey, YonDarius Johnson and Tre Lynch each pumped in 15 points for Southern (14-10, 10-1 SWAC), which now leads the conference standings by two full games after second-place Alabama State fell to Arkansas-Pine Bluff. Godfrey pulled down nine rebounds. The Jaguars built a nine-point lead at intermission, then held off a Jackson State rally. Southern was 22 of 48 from the field and 10 of 15 from long range. Julysses Nobles tossed in 20 points to lead the Tigers (8-15, 4-7). Derrell Taylor added 14 points and Brandon West contributed 13 points and grabbed 12 rebounds. Jackson State shot 36 percent from the field (18 of 50) and was 4 of 6 from long range.
